alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 9:11AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, blowing and drifting snow. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow diminishes this morning, but gusty winds will create significant drifting and blowing snow hazards over mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
